title: Weighted Pens Heavy Grip Pens Writing Black Ink Weighted Rollerball Pens for Hand Tremors, Low Dexterity, Weak Grip Strength, Parkinson's Patients, Elderly Adults and Kids, 3 Colors (6)
features: What you get: the package contains several weighted pens in 3 colors, namely gold, silver and rose gold; The enough quantity can meet your various needs in daily use and replacement; Along with a black flannelette bag for well storage of the weighted pens

Heavy grip weighted pen: the pen body is glossy and delicate, comfortable to grip; The design of the hefty balanced weight provides users with a well control, weight 1.52 oz,reduces hand fatigue and tremor while increasing muscle strength

Smooth-rolling rollerball pen tip: there is a quality rollerball on the tip of the black gel ink pen, therefore, the rollerball pen can slide over paper and material more fluently; These black ink ballpoint pens allow you to write clear and neat lines and words

Wide application: during writing, the heavy weighted pen with black ink effortlessly glides over paper and requires less pressure; These weighted rollerball pens are very suitable for kids, seniors and people with arthritis, carpal tunnel, hand tremor, low dexterity, weak grip strength and Parkinson's
description: Features:  Quality material: The heavy grip ink pen consists of quality ink and metal material, durable and not easy to break, comfortable to grip and full of elegance, can serve you for a long time. There is a pen clip on the rollerball pen for easy storage and carry, so that you can clip the pen in a shirt pocket or a book.
